metadata.title: Tuesday, 18th March, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to establish a commercial water utility company in Muchinga Province for purposes of enhancing service delivery;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to resume the importation of electricity from Malawi to supply power to Chama and Lundazi Districts;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) if there are no such plans, why; and
(d) whether Zesco Limited was exporting electricity to Malawi, as of November, 2024.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate township roads in Siavonga District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Chitambo Mission Hospital, especially the theatre, which is in a deplorable state;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why. 7. ORDER OF THE DAY Thanks - The President’s Address – Motion (4th March) - Resumption of debate: (Dr Mwanza, MP). ___________________________
